document_data.caption: A map showing Traders' Way in east Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Traders' Way
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Traders' Way''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Traders' Way was located in east Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The road originated on [[Star Street (Zhentil Keep)|Star Street]], branching southwest to end at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] after several blocks. Traders' Way was intersected by [[Black Street]], [[Beholder Street]], and the [[Street of Sorrow]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentilar]] barracks was located along Traders' Way at its junction with the Street of Sorrow.
